# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=39.5, y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0, y=-60.0)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of following entities
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)
- Steam engine (position x=117.5, y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5, y=-34.5)
- Pipe group (position x=105.5, y=-32.5)
- Electricity group (position x=114.5, y=-28.666666666666668)

### Transport belt system at position(x=40.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of following entities
- Belt group (position x=40.5, y=-83.5)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when entities are not fueled
- Ensure that burner mining drills, stone furnaces, and boilers have a fuel source before operating.
- Make sure to replenish fuel for entities that are running low.

### Errors when entities are not connected
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source, such as a boiler, before operating.
- Verify that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network.

### Errors when entities are waiting for source items
- Ensure that burner inserters have a source of items to transport before operating.
- Verify that stone furnaces have the necessary ingredients to operate.

### Errors when entities are not working
- Check for any blockages or issues that may be preventing entities from working.
- Verify that all necessary entities are properly connected and fueled.

# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
